title: 'UpsamplingBilinear2d' object has no attribute 'mode'
body_html:
I trained a model with pytorch 0.1 several days ago and now I upgrade to 0.3, the model can't work anymore.

File "F:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 366, in getattr
type(self).name, name))

AttributeError: 'UpsamplingBilinear2d' object has no attribute 'mode'

What can I do?
body_text:
I trained a model with pytorch 0.1 several days ago and now I upgrade to 0.3, the model can't work anymore.
File "F:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 366, in getattr
type(self).name, name))
AttributeError: 'UpsamplingBilinear2d' object has no attribute 'mode'
What can I do?
body:
I trained a model with pytorch 0.1 several days ago and now I upgrade to 0.3, the model can't work anymore.

  File "F:\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 366, in __getattr__
    type(self).__name__, name))

AttributeError: 'UpsamplingBilinear2d' object has no attribute 'mode'

What can I do?
